name: sybase_fetch_row
purpose: Get a result row as an enumerated array

return.description:
Returns an array that corresponds to the fetched row, or FALSE if there
   are no more rows. Each result column is stored in an array offset,
   starting at offset 0.Data types
   
    
     
      PHP
      Sybase
     
    
    
     
      string
      VARCHAR, TEXT, CHAR, IMAGE, BINARY, VARBINARY, DATETIME
     
     
      int
      NUMERIC (w/o precision), DECIMAL (w/o precision), INT, BIT, TINYINT, SMALLINT
     
     
      float
      NUMERIC (w/ precision), DECIMAL (w/ precision), REAL, FLOAT, MONEY
     
     
      NULL
      NULL
